description: Create an axe web component without properties. There's just the identification string (is). For the HTML, you can use empty template tags for now.
followUpMessage: Hehe. The hardest work for your axe is already done. Now let's tie together a handle and a rock!

exercises.hint:
<link rel="import" href="lib/polymer/polymer-element.html">

<dom-module id="axe">
    <template>
    </template>
</dom-module>

<script>
    class Axe extends Polymer.Element {

        static get is() {
            return 'axe';
        }
    }

    window.customElements.define(Axe.is, Axe);
</script>
Oops, you didn't have to change anything to this file! Undo your change!
